name: Brightblood
description:
CONTROLLS

WASD >> Up, Left, Down,Right

Shift >> Teleport

Space or Left Click >> Attack

Right Click >> Switch Attack

"R" to restart

 As the short description states, this is a combat demo of a top-down action RPG! It is in the early development stage so we would love to hear feedback! Especially on the movement of the character, mechanics, difficulty of the current stage, bugs, and anything else. Again we would highly appreciate any feedback as we move forward with the development of this game.  Thank you for checking this out, there is a lot more to come!
